item.description:
With the weather approaching, or in,  the 60's tomorrow let's go for a nice ride

Ride is about 18 miles and we will try to keep a 12-15 mile pace when riding.  We'll stop at a few places along the way.

Things to bring:  Helmet (required), Tire Repair kit, Water

Afterwards we may stop at a local pub for some food and drink

Let's meet behind the Bank of America / Not Your Average Joes parking lot which is near the corner of Mystic Ave and Mass Ave (RT 60 & 2A)

* please indicate in your RSVP if you would like to extend the ride an additional 8 miles by going to scenic Concord center.  If everyone says yes than we will plan for it.

Hope to see you tomorrow (if you are still in town).
item.how_to_find_us: Will email my phone number out to rsvp's Sat morning.
item.name: Minute Man Trail Bike Ride
